title: Big Bang Istiod Values Schema
description: JSON Schema for Big Bang Istiod Helm chart values.yaml

enabled.description: Enable or disable the bundled network policies

controlPlaneCIDRs.description: Configure which CIDRs istiod will be allowed to connect to when accessing the kube-apiserver; if none are specified, the chart will look up the default kubernetes EndpointSlice and use the addresses found there

additionalPolicies.description: A list of additional network policies to create in the release namespace

additionalEnvoyFilters.description: A list of additional EnvoyFilters to create in the release namespace

enabled.description: Enable or disable the bundled monitoring components and network policies

mode.description: Set the mTLS mode for the istio-system namespace

enabled.description: Enable or disable the default security headers

upstream.description: Values to pass to the upstream istiod chart (https://github.com/istio/istio/blob/master/manifests/charts/istio-control/istio-discovery/values.yaml)
